name: Movies of Richard Gere Online Trivia | Celebrities | 10 Questions

questions.text: Gere had the male lead in "Chicago". Which song did he perform?
questions.explanation:
Razzle-Dazzle.

	"Jazz" is the great opening number; it's performed by Catherine Zeta-Jones and Renee Zelwegger. "Mr. Cellophane" is a nice number, too -  but it's not by Gere. The movie doesn't have much of a plot, but it's fun to watch.

Jodie Foster.

	Fawcett was with Gere in "Dr. T. & the Women". Basinger was with him in "Final Analysis"; Zelwegger was with him in "Chicago". It's a curious (and somewhat flat) movie.

questions.text: Gere starred in "Mothman Prophecies". Where did the mothman occurrences supposedly take place?
questions.explanation:
West Virginia.

	The story - which is said to be fact-based - deals with incidents that are said to have happened in West Virginia. It's an incredible story - if it's true.

questions.text: Gere starred in "The Cotton Club". Where is the club located?
questions.explanation:
New York City.

	Back in the Speakeasy days of the roaring 20's, there was "The Cotton Club" in New York City. (The Club did well; the movie didn't.)

questions.text: Gere plays a psychiatrist in "Final Analysis". One of his patients deceives him into believing that she is having a particular dream. In reality, where does the dream come from?
questions.correct: It's a  dream by one of Freud's patients
options: It's taken from a classic novel
It's the plot of a popular movie
questions.explanation:
It's a  dream by one of Freud's patients.

	Uma Thurman plays the patient; Kim Basinger plays her sister. Thurman's "dream" is actually borrowed from Freud's story of "Irma".

questions.text: Who co-starred with Gere in "Days of Heaven"?
questions.explanation:
Brooke Adams.

	Thurman was in "Final Analysis"; Winger was in "An Officer and a Gentleman"; Roberts was in "Pretty Woman". This a beautifully photographed movie - but the story drags.

questions.text: In "An Officer and A Gentleman", Gere pursues what career?
questions.explanation:
Flier.

	Gere starred with Debra Winger and Lou Gossett, Jr. It's one of Gere's best roles and one of his best movies.

Diane Lane.

	Stone starred with Gere in "Intersection". Jones starred with him in "Chicago"; Hunt was in "Dr. T. & the Women".

questions.text: Which movie does NOT include Richard Gere in the cast?
questions.explanation:
Legends of the Fall.

	Three of the choices are dramas which include Gere in the cast. "Legends" includes Brad Pitt and Anthony Hopkins in the cast, but not Gere.

questions.text: Which movie does NOT one include Richard Gere in the cast?
questions.explanation:
A Perfect Murder.

	Again, three of the choices are dramas that include Gere in the cast."Murder" stars Michael Douglas.
